document_data.name: Lurraxol
document_data.mainbody: The '''Lurraxols''' were one of the wealthiest noble families of [[Amn]] during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: The family owed most of their wealth due to their ownership of numerous [[gold]] mines, their expertise as navigators,
document_data.Base of Operations: While the family had holds in nearly every Amnian city, including [[Athkatla]], their primary estate was located in [[Murann]].
document_data.Relationships:
The family held hostile competition against the [[Kaptonneme]] family and their [[Neomar Ships|shipbuilding business]].

The Trademeet Lurraxols had a family feud with the [[Alibakkar]]s in that city.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1370}}, Lady Ximora sought to take back access to the trade routes in and out of [[Riatavin]], while the city was in the throes of rebellion. When her granddaughter [[Lilith Lurraxol|Lilith]] could not successfully "convince" [[Logan Coprith|Lord Logan Coprith]],
document_data.Notable Members:
* [[Ximora Lurraxol]]: The family matriarch who took over leading the family after the death of her brother
* [[Tynsor Lurraxol]]: Lady Ximora's young and self-important nephew
* [[Lilith Lurraxol]]: The young noblewoman from Trademeet
* [[Barasta Cleeith]]: Senior [[priest]]ess at the temple of [[Goldspires]]
* [[Marlyn Lurraxol|Marlyn "Luxor"]]: An exiled [[diviner]] who worked as a barmaid in [[Eshpurta]]
